summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TechGalaxy e-commerce platform new features including Wishlist, Compare Products, Addresses, Support Tickets, Loyalty Points, and PDF Invoice generation. Backend APIs are 100% functional, frontend pages load correctly with minor UI integration issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Form field mapping issue - phone field shows city name instead of phone number
Modal overlay prevents form submission - dialog overlay intercepts clicks

integration_issues.issue: Wishlist and Compare buttons not clearly visible or accessible on product detail page

passed_tests: Backend API - All wishlist endpoints (GET, POST, DELETE)
Backend API - Compare products endpoint with 2-4 products
Backend API - Address management (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Backend API - Support tickets (GET, POST, reply, status update)
Backend API - Loyalty points balance and history
Backend API - PDF invoice generation (2358 bytes PDF created)
Frontend - Wishlist page loads with empty state
Frontend - Support tickets page loads with existing ticket
Frontend - Orders page displays user orders
Frontend - Cart page shows empty state
Frontend - Product detail page loads with specifications
Frontend - Currency selector functionality (KES, USD, EUR)

high_priority: Fix modal overlay issue in AddressForm preventing form submission
Add visible Wishlist and Compare buttons to product detail pages
medium_priority: Fix form field mapping in address creation dialog
Ensure proper data-testid attributes for wishlist/compare buttons
low_priority: Consider adding loyalty points display in user navigation area
